title: Dev Blog: The Animation of Ivern

replies.body:
Hi Riot,
I was reading through this and I find all the processes and thoughts that go into a characters animation as well as his back story and aesthetics. 

As a games student from down under, I was wondering what programs you use to model and animate. I've only been working with 3D models for 6 months now, but I'm super excited and enormously enthusiastic at looking at professionals work and work flow.
Thanks for the amazing game and behind the scenes! 

Sincerley, 
    Soulyman
a tree can walk but graves cant have a cigar{{champion:104}} {{item:3070}}

{{champion:103}} Ahri Should Have A Star Guardian Skin

The Star Guardian skins are good and all, but don't you think they need some proper enemies? I know we have dar star skins, but maybe something different that is designed to be enemies of the star guardians. Jhin would be a great start :D i need more jhin skins :(
nah that is too close to arcade with bright lights. I did want to see a star guardian Soraka though, on the other hand she might be a bit old.
